==German== ===Etymology=== From the same root as {{m|de|Gewicht||weight}}, thus pertaining to {{m|de|wiegen||to weigh}}. See also {{m|de|gewichtig}}, a (formal or elevated) synonym of ''wichtig''. Weight is often used as a metaphor for importance; compare {{cog|de|schwerwiegend||serious, grave}}, as well as English {{m|en|weighty}}, {{m|en|heavy}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvɪçtɪç/}} (Northern Germany), {{IPA|de|/ˈvɪʃtɪʃ/}} (Sachsen, Rheinland), {{IPA|de|/ˈviçtik/}} (Southern Germany, Austria) * {{audio|de|De-at-wichtig.ogg|audio (Austria)}} {{IPA|de|/ˈviçtik/}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|sten}} # [[important]], [[relevant]], [[significant]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|wichtig|wichtiger|wichtigst}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|unwichtig}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Wichtigkeit}} * {{l|de|wichtigmachen}} * {{l|de|wichtigtun}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
